long_description: Lightweights Red Reflective Tape(TM) contains 100 in. x 3/8 in. of reflective, self-adhesive tape manufactured by 3M Scotchlite(TM). Can be applied to your bike, car, helmet, racks, fenders, hoods, seatstays, carbon fiber components and more. Lightweights Red Reflective Tape sticks to just about any hard, plastic, metal or painted surface; it can be seen from 500 ft. away by oncoming traffic.
short_description: Lightweights Red Reflective Tape(TM) contains 100 in. x 3/8 in. of reflective, self-adhesive tape manufactured by 3M Scotchlite(TM).
